    • Method Detail

      • rayIntersection

        boolean rayIntersection(Line3f ray,
                        boolean bStartsInside,
                        RayIntersection intersection)
        Test for a ray intersection closer than intersection.m_fDistance and if there is a closer intersection save in information about that intersection in the intersection
        Parameters:
        ray - The ray being intersected.
        bStartsInside - true if this ray is inside an object, false if this is an
        intersection - The intersection.
        Returns:
        true if there is a closer intersection, false otherwise.

      • testShadow

        boolean testShadow(Line3f rayToLight,
                   float fDistLight)
        Test for this object blocking the light to intersection
        Parameters:
        rayToLight - The ray to the light.
        fDistLight - The distance to the light.
        Returns:
        true if this object casts a shadow, false otherwise.
